dcterms:description: The ILCI corpus consists of multilingual parallel corpora for various Indian languages, facilitating the development of linguistic resources for resource-poor languages through feature transfer techniques.
dcterms:title: ILCI (Indian Languages Corpora Initiative) parallel corpora

dcterms:creator: Akshar Bharati

Dipti Misra Sharma

dcterms:description: The Hindi Treebank is a multi-layered representation of Hindi sentences with syntactic and semantic annotations, including morph analysis, POS tagging, and chunking.
dcterms:title: Hindi Treebank
